projects.title: Clean Architecture Pattern
projects.description: Constant exploration is a great way to discover new architectural patterns and stay current. This project follows the Clean Architecture Pattern, which has its foundation deep in SOLID Principles. It is a simple concept with numerous benefits, particulary for large scale applications.

projects.title: Chat Web App
projects.description: This project arouse from of my curiosity about how a chat application works. Implemented during my studies free-time, it was really enjoyable time spend because I learned a lot about how to use SignalR.

projects.title: Train Ticket Web App
projects.description: Elasticsearch has been always a great approach to quickly retrieve data using flexible queries. This project addresses a full search using autocomplete on the Stackoverflow database. It proved fast and efficient, with several tweaking options to optimise the query.

projects.title: Send messages using Rabbit MQ
projects.description: Rabbit MQ is the most widely deployed open source message broker. It wouldn't be long before I got my hands on another free-time project, this time to investigate how messages are sent, queued then received.

projects.title: Personal Website
projects.description: A good practice exercising my passion for coding, and let the world know about it, was to make a copy of my Curriculum Vitae and deloy it live. Its completely front-end work, with JSON data and it uses Firebase hosting. Design and styling are not my strong suits, but I am well aware that practice is the only way to overcome them.
